comments: i just started to play the game and was really enjoying it. Nice story line and fun to play. Then it got to the point at level 2 where the crib section was and the ads stop loading try again later. I keep trying to go back after waiting to play and it still gives me the same response. $10 to pay for a game is extremely expensive, I have never seen a game on google play for that amount of money. Most are free or free trial but not at the rate you guys charge. Seriously? you guys need to be more reasonable because the majority of your players are kids. So a word to the developer. If you want to attract and keep your content enjoyable for all ages, make it affordable to all young and old. Im just saying. I myself enjoyed the game overall, but I honestly will not pay that amount to play the game when there are so many other games to play that are free for all.

Love all the delicious Emily games, however I don't like how you have to connect to Facebook to earn a trophy, and some of the game controls didn't work correctly all the time. The swipe motion didn't seem to work very well on a lot of levels making me replay the same level multiple times because swipe wouldn't work and would mess up the whole level. I almost deleted it because of this but I'm glad I stuck with it.

Great game, love the back story and the different levels. Only issue was on level 51 the story telling part/intro didn't work, there was no dialogue, all I could do was press skip. I tried updating the app and clear the cache and it still didn't work.

I love this game! Storylines amazing, graphics amazing, levels amazing, music amazing... the only problems I had with the game were a couple glitches with the advertisements, and level and i had to skip level 51 because of some weird glitch,  but otherwise the game was the best!

I think it is hard for few people to purchase it. I personally love thus game but cannot purchase it. I hope and request game house to remove those purchase things will be removed so that I can play easily and so as other people.
Love delicious Emily, Fabulous Angela and Hearts Medicine. I'll always buy them and I can't wait for the next game to come out.
description: Join Emily for a very special chapter of her life! One thing's for sure, her family will never be the same again after this...Right after Emily starts her very own cooking video blog, she receives some heart-warming news... She's expecting a new bundle of joy! But how's Emily going to combine everything that's going on in her life with getting ready for the baby? 👶 🍼🍼 WELCOME THE NEW DELICIOUS FAMILY MEMBER and be a part of this heart-felt stage in Emily's life🍼 PLAY 60 TOUCHING TIME MANAGEMENT LEVELS and 30 extra challenging bonus levels🍼 GUIDE EMILY THROUGH HER PREGNANCY and witness her many ups and downs first hand🍼 DISCOVER 6 DIFFERENT LOCATIONS and visit Emily's Kitchen, a Yoga Studio, a Day Care Center and other super cute baby-related places🍼 HANG OUT WITH EMILY'S FRIENDS AND FAMILY and say hi to Angela, François and Allison, plus many others🍼 CUSTOMIZE THE NEW NURSERY and surprise Emily with the perfect baby room🍼 TRY NEW FEATURES LIKE DAILY CHALLENGES and take on a new challenge level every day🍼 CREATE YOUR OWN DELICIOUS POSTCARDSand earn all the trophies to share special messages with your loved onesWill you be there for Emily when she needs you most?Having your very own cooking video blog and sharing delicious family recipes with the rest of the world doesn't come easy. 🎥 🍝 It's hard work - and with a family like Emily's, you never know what might happen...On top of everything, Emily's really tired and hasn't been feeling well lately. She and Patrick have been trying to have another baby, but without any success. Is it simply not in the cards for them? Yet just as they try to accept this, Emily receives some life-changing news... She's not feeling well, because she's pregnant! 👶Emily and Patrick couldn't be happier! But how are they going to manage everything that's going on? Preparing for the baby, filming the cooking vlog, handling their over-excited family... They could use a hand!Help Emily through this emotional rollercoaster and get ready to experience the miracles of life! ❤Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.Follow Emily on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeliciousGames/Enjoy more GameHouse Original Stories, and try our other games:🌟 Delicious - Emily's Message in a Bottle: https://goo.gl/PEyYzG🌟 Delicious - Emily's Hopes and Fears: https://goo.gl/NlFYvf🌟 Heart's Medicine - Hospital Heat: https://goo.gl/VOLClp🌟 Heart's Medicine - Time to Heal: https://goo.gl/pkAp5J🌟 Fabulous - Angela's High School Reunion: https://goo.gl/UmfsOC🌟 Fabulous - Angela's Fashion Fever: https://goo.gl/czC8qo🌟 Sally's Salon - Beauty Secrets: https://goo.gl/u7TEij🌟 Dr. Cares - Pet Rescue 911: https://goo.gl/XNV042🌟 Mary le Chef - Cooking Passion: https://goo.gl/xQRE0y
descriptionHTML:
Join Emily for a very special chapter of her life! One thing's for sure, her family will never be the same again after this...

Right after Emily starts her very own cooking video blog, she receives some heart-warming news... She's expecting a new bundle of joy! But how's Emily going to combine everything that's going on in her life with getting ready for the baby? 👶 🍼

🍼 WELCOME THE NEW DELICIOUS FAMILY MEMBER and be a part of this heart-felt stage in Emily's life
🍼 PLAY 60 TOUCHING TIME MANAGEMENT LEVELS and 30 extra challenging bonus levels
🍼 GUIDE EMILY THROUGH HER PREGNANCY and witness her many ups and downs first hand
🍼 DISCOVER 6 DIFFERENT LOCATIONS and visit Emily's Kitchen, a Yoga Studio, a Day Care Center and other super cute baby-related places
🍼 HANG OUT WITH EMILY'S FRIENDS AND FAMILY and say hi to Angela, François and Allison, plus many others
🍼 CUSTOMIZE THE NEW NURSERY and surprise Emily with the perfect baby room
🍼 TRY NEW FEATURES LIKE DAILY CHALLENGES and take on a new challenge level every day
🍼 CREATE YOUR OWN DELICIOUS POSTCARDSand earn all the trophies to share special messages with your loved ones

Will you be there for Emily when she needs you most?

Having your very own cooking video blog and sharing delicious family recipes with the rest of the world doesn't come easy. 🎥 🍝 It's hard work - and with a family like Emily's, you never know what might happen...

On top of everything, Emily's really tired and hasn't been feeling well lately. She and Patrick have been trying to have another baby, but without any success. Is it simply not in the cards for them? Yet just as they try to accept this, Emily receives some life-changing news... She's not feeling well, because she's pregnant! 👶

Emily and Patrick couldn't be happier! But how are they going to manage everything that's going on? Preparing for the baby, filming the cooking vlog, handling their over-excited family... They could use a hand!

Help Emily through this emotional rollercoaster and get ready to experience the miracles of life! ❤

Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.

Follow Emily on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeliciousGames/

comments: I had given it 5 stars. But changed my mind . What's up with the game being deleted from my account. And all my achievements that I worked so hard for are all gone from my gamer profile. It says I got zero experience achieved and my castle was level 19. Paid for packages and did nothing wrong for my game to dissapear like that. All my other games remained intact but WoO. I would like for all my WoO data to get sent from developers copy if possible. I got a buch of screenshots to back up what I'm saying, and all my google receipts from all the purchases I did.

The usual city builder game that's easy to build up your castle/city way faster than it's other counterparts. The people I've met on this game were pretty kind, the battle simulating is a nice touch which I haven't seen anywhere else. Sad that I only get to see like 3/4 models of the same monsters though.

This is a war game where no one wants ts to fight. Don't try attacking anyone bigger than you. They won't fight you back, they will just attack your buildings, which you won't be able to defend. It costs real money to avoid having them destroyed. Spend your time and money somewhere else.

After playing mobile strike for a solid year, that game is really expensive if you want to be at the top with the big dogs. And this game seems great to where you don't have to spend much and actually enjoy the game. The graphics on her are amazing. I would suggest playing this game to all. 👍👊

Been playing game for couple of days, enjoying it so far. Lots to do, build times not to long at start, graphics good. Love the fact that in game purchases are there if you want them but you are not pushed to buy. Game plays well on my Samsung tablet and LG phone. Been playing for months now, still love it, definately not a play to win if you get into a good alliance

When I first downloaded it promised you didn't need to pay to win and that hackers would be felt with - that was a lie. If your not prepared to spend a lot of money your just going to get wiped out by those who do or their hacker friends. This game isn't worth the time and data needed to play until there is a level and fair playing field.
description: Google Play’s Carnaval - Festive updates you can’t resist Build your own world in this strategy war game! War and Order is the perfect fusion of real time strategy, tower defense, and castle building games and has received several Global Google Recommendations. Orcs, elves, and mages are yours to command in a gorgeous 3D medieval game world. Raise a massive fantasy army for HUGE fully animated battles. Clash with enemies from all over the world in real-time! Choose your alliance and take castles, slay monsters, and stake new territory as a tribe! This is WAR, and there’s never a dull moment as your screen lights up with constant new battles, chats, and upgrades!You must battle to become more powerful than any king in history in this dangerous war game. It’s up to you, your strategy, and your allies to conquer an endless world of empires and imagination.★HOMELAND• Recruit and train over 50 fantasy soldiers, uniting Orcs, Elves, Humans, Mages, Beasts, and Angels.• Your ultimate building game: Construct and upgrade tons of buildings for new soldiers, buffs, and resources!• Research new magic and technology FAST for cutting-edge tactics and weapons!★ALLIANCE• Friend, feud, and chat with players from around the world in real time. • Fight and build together to conquer enemies and build castles you could never hold alone.• Share and expand territory for exclusive bonuses! • But remember! This is a war strategy game. Tust no one!★CONFRONTATION• Sweep the battlefield in huge real-time PvP matches!• Build your force to leviathan proportions!• Engulf other lords’ castles as you expand your territory.★CONQUEST• Command and conquer other players’ castles to plunder their resources and climb power rankings!• Vanquish roaming monsters for their treasures, from man-eating Ogres to massive Dragons.• Play castle defense games and protect yourself and your allies from would-be conquerors.★EMPIRE• Not just a one castle game: Take over the Royal City to rule over the realm with unheard of power and privileges! • Explore unknown lands to find elite resources, ancient ruins, and more surprises!• Grow your alliance territory for richer rewards and resources!Follow War and Order on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarandOrder1/
descriptionHTML:
Google Play’s Carnaval - Festive updates you can’t resist

Build your own world in this strategy war game! War and Order is the perfect fusion of real time strategy, tower defense, and castle building games and has received several Global Google Recommendations.

Orcs, elves, and mages are yours to command in a gorgeous 3D medieval game world. Raise a massive fantasy army for HUGE fully animated battles. Clash with enemies from all over the world in real-time! Choose your alliance and take castles, slay monsters, and stake new territory as a tribe! This is WAR, and there’s never a dull moment as your screen lights up with constant new battles, chats, and upgrades!

You must battle to become more powerful than any king in history in this dangerous war game. It’s up to you, your strategy, and your allies to conquer an endless world of empires and imagination.

★HOMELAND
• Recruit and train over 50 fantasy soldiers, uniting Orcs, Elves, Humans, Mages, Beasts, and Angels.
• Your ultimate building game: Construct and upgrade tons of buildings for new soldiers, buffs, and resources!
• Research new magic and technology FAST for cutting-edge tactics and weapons!

★ALLIANCE
• Friend, feud, and chat with players from around the world in real time.
• Fight and build together to conquer enemies and build castles you could never hold alone.
• Share and expand territory for exclusive bonuses!
• But remember! This is a war strategy game. Tust no one!

★CONFRONTATION
• Sweep the battlefield in huge real-time PvP matches!
• Build your force to leviathan proportions!
• Engulf other lords’ castles as you expand your territory.

★CONQUEST
• Command and conquer other players’ castles to plunder their resources and climb power rankings!
• Vanquish roaming monsters for their treasures, from man-eating Ogres to massive Dragons.
• Play castle defense games and protect yourself and your allies from would-be conquerors.

★EMPIRE
• Not just a one castle game: Take over the Royal City to rule over the realm with unheard of power and privileges!
• Explore unknown lands to find elite resources, ancient ruins, and more surprises!
• Grow your alliance territory for richer rewards and resources!

Follow War and Order on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/WarandOrder1/
developerAddress: 1201 Orange street, suite 600, Wilmington DE, USA
recentChanges: Google Play’s Carnaval - Festive updates you can’t resist
1. Accounts can now be bound to multiple 3rd party services! A single game account can now bind 2 third-party login methods.
3. Optimized Elite Wars declaration requirements: Cannot declare on alliances that will battle within 2 hours.
summary: Build a fantasy empire! Orcs, elves, amazing graphics. Battle players worldwide!
title: War and Order

description: How much can you concentrate?Meet Shape Escape, one of the newest strategy and attention-grabbing games of 2017. Bounce a ball that is between the polygons and try to throw it in the bottom box. But watch out because if the ball touches to the thorns in the shapes, you'll loose. Bounce the ball in time and free it from rotating polygons. As the chapters progress, you will see the number of shapes increase and you will see the shapes that are intertwined. Here is the Android game Shape Escape with colorful themes.
descriptionHTML:
How much can you concentrate?

Meet Shape Escape, one of the newest strategy and attention-grabbing games of 2017. Bounce a ball that is between the polygons and try to throw it in the bottom box. But watch out because if the ball touches to the thorns in the shapes, you'll loose. Bounce the ball in time and free it from rotating polygons. comments: Awesome game! Love the art, love the music, love the style, and the gameplay is actually challenging enough to hold my attention but not enough to be irritating. Perfect difficulty. Not to mention the colorblind mode actually works. I know this is receiving a lot of criticism, but I love the option you guys gave with ads and how well you executed it, that was a very nice touch. You really outdid yourselves with this one!

A very decent small game. I don't know what other people are complaining about but you can play the game without paying. The music is nice the graphics is nice it's easy to play. I hope there more levels in the future as this is such a fun game. Very nice one from the team at noodlecake Studios. Kudos my n*****

This title should be moved in the puzzle category in my opinion! Charming story with beautiful low-polygon graphics... Etc! Nevertheless, the game is very short to complete... If, you are not interested in completing the game achievements! There are not enough worlds and levels (right now) and I expect new ones in future updates... Eh! I would certainly convince more mobile gamers to purchase the full game (with unlimited lives and no ads) at 3.99$ CDN. Regardless, I purchased the full version of this game to support one of my favourite Canadian gaming app developer on the Google Play store... 👍😉
No viable instruction, very "money-centric", can't turn off sound effects for quiet play, just the music. Overall, a disappointing waste of time. Uninstalled.
The lives rate behind a paywall is a joke.  Nothing but a money grab.  I will be removing the game

Really fun game, but once you've got a couple colors going, it doesn't like to click the changer buttons. It also doesn't like when you click the buttons while you're moving. Lots of potential here (Currently at 1000 downloads, so I feel like it's still working out the kinks)

description: Offroad Bike Racing is an exciting and realistic bike racing game. Ride your Bike on dangerous hilly roads and treacherous terrains. Offroad Bike Racing is fun, challenging and will test your patience for sure!Ride through some challenging levels, under extreme weather conditions. Each level of Offroad Bike Racing  is more thrilling than the previous level. description: Crafting a city and building your own Aztec temples! Exploration of an ancient blocky world of rituals and tribal dances. City building games in a blocky world made from cubes that you can mine. Go craft temples and huts, the only limit is your imagination!Featuring:• Exploration of an ancient civilization• Crafting and creative building• Tribal life simulation games• Exotic materials to mine• Lots of free craft items to play with• Amazing blocky graphics• Animal pets to play withOne of the best historical simulator games! In this crafting history series you're being transported back in time to the peak of the ancient Aztec civilization. The time when new temples were built every year to appease the gods. Aztecs were notoriously known for their rituals performed in these pyramid temples - now you can take part in these celebrations! Dance with the priests and cultists and try to bring fertility to the land and abundant rains for the crops. Crafting of your own tribal dresses and spears might be required.This simulator game allows you for full immersion and exploration in the blocky world of creativity. Walk around and admire the tribal people that live their lives in impressive headdresses, watch them perform rituals and sacrifices. Most of them are armed with spears, but they won't attack you - your exploration of this world of Aztec cubes is totally safe.There are lots of items that you can craft by hand and place around. Take part in city building games and recreate any kind of ancient buildings you want - any crafting ideas will work for this building work. Mine resources and craft huge structures that will dwarf even the Pyramid of the Sun, the biggest temple in Teotihuacan. Creative mode allows you even for building your own city. How many simulator games will give you that?Use your craft powers to the max! Unlock city building design plans so you don't have to craft everything by hand. Just place the plan and fill it with blocky cubes. Craft your own world in just minutes, just mine the required resources!
descriptionHTML:
Crafting a city and building your own Aztec temples! Exploration of an ancient blocky world of rituals and tribal dances. City building games in a blocky world made from cubes that you can mine. Go craft temples and huts, the only limit is your imagination!

Featuring:
• Exploration of an ancient civilization
• Crafting and creative building
• Tribal life simulation games
• Exotic materials to mine
• Lots of free craft items to play with
• Amazing blocky graphics
• Animal pets to play with

One of the best historical simulator games! In this crafting history series you're being transported back in time to the peak of the ancient Aztec civilization. The time when new temples were built every year to appease the gods. Aztecs were notoriously known for their rituals performed in these pyramid temples - now you can take part in these celebrations! Dance with the priests and cultists and try to bring fertility to the land and abundant rains for the crops. Crafting of your own tribal dresses and spears might be required.

This simulator game allows you for full immersion and exploration in the blocky world of creativity. Walk around and admire the tribal people that live their lives in impressive headdresses, watch them perform rituals and sacrifices. Most of them are armed with spears, but they won't attack you - your exploration of this world of Aztec cubes is totally safe.

There are lots of items that you can craft by hand and place around. Take part in city building games and recreate any kind of ancient buildings you want - any crafting ideas will work for this building work. Mine resources and craft huge structures that will dwarf even the Pyramid of the Sun, the biggest temple in Teotihuacan. Creative mode allows you even for building your own city. How many simulator games will give you that?

Use your craft powers to the max! Unlock city building design plans so you don't have to craft everything by hand. Just place the plan and fill it with blocky cubes. Craft your own world in just minutes, just mine the required resources!
developer: Fat Lion Games: Crafting & Building Adventure
summary: Creative crafting and exploration! Mine blocks, craft an Aztec city by hand!
title: Aztec Craft: Ancient Blocky City Building Games 3D

comments: Game started off fine, and it's challenging. I seem to be finding that the higher up in levels you get the more issues there are. Game keeps crashing and restarting, I have a lot of times I don't get my whole free time awarded to me. I am seriously considering uninstalling this game because these issues are taking the fun out of it.

Overall is addicting, but I'm so pissed off that the game keep on crashing at level 754. Whenever I was almost winning, the game will crash. I even rebooted my phone but it still happened! When I was losing that level, the game was totally fine. Thank god there's a 24hr free lives right now, but I will uninstall it if this problem is not rectified asap.

It would be 5 stars but the game pauses and freezes a lot.  When it freezes it takes away a  life, any boosts bought and won't send you to the next level even if you win. It also takes forever to load. Even after installing Google Play Games, it still freezes and takes forever load. pleeeease fix these glitches, I don't want to have to start playing Toy Blast 😐

This game makes it too apparent that they want you to spend money with them. Games are more fun when you get so caught up in them that spending money on them is just an afterthought. This game is designed to stop you from winning in to many different ways. The birds that are supposed to help you only screw up your strategy most of the time, and I have seen bubbles just reappear. Not joking, literally watched them just appear out of nowhere. I have seen too many ways in which a win can be taken away from you. So, it feels a little unfair and forced. I understand it is business, but it seems to be designed to be a little to greedy for my taste.

Terrible freezing,  while playing. In losing lives and boosters.  YOU NEED TO FIX THIS,  IF YOU'RE GOING TO WANT GAMERS TO SPEND MONEY... Update.. Almost a year later, its STILL CRASHING.. Quick question developer... "Do you ever give this app and comments any attention!!??!?!?!"..
My only complaint, the stupid 5 lives thing.  Later in the game when it's tough I end up having to stop playing because I'm out of life.

description: This baby girl is definitely asking for your professional help in this hairstyle game because either you are prepared to offer it or not you need to play it right away at least to try. First you are going to wash her hair to make it clean and nice, then you'll brush her to get rid of the extra hair, then you will make a nice braided hairstyle to make her happy. But the caring process is more than a simple washing, first you will cut off the damaged hair which has no chance of recovery. Brush the hair as long as the instructions will indicate and just apply the shampoo to offer that extra volume and shine. To prevent the dehydration and the split ends you must put on a special mask for the hair that you will do it yourself. Add the given ingredients, mix them and apply the final composition on the head. Wash the hair again, dry it and arrange the rebel hair yarns. Now all that is left is the braiding part where you will literally gather the hair and place it in the shown spot to get a nice and well arranged headdress. When you are done you can even add a nice head band with beautiful colors and details on it. Have fun and remember to play not only to get better, but to fulfill your inner passion.  You really don't want to miss these cool features presented by this hair styling game:- Free to play- Pretty easy to handle the control- Entertain yourself with quality music and nice graphics- Be a hairstylist as good as you can be in the braided area- Multitude of processes to accomplish- Take care of a dehydrated hair and cut the damaged hair yarns- Put together the strands that needs to be taken for a well executed braid- Moisturize the hair with a home made mask that you are making

comments: This game was my favorite of any maybe ever. I played all the time, then there was an update and I had to uninstall. It made the app close constantly (even when it wasn't even open and I was in other apps), there's way too many ads that make me want to vomit, and it stats to lag now when it never did before. Someone at corporate ruined this game. Smh.

The game itself is pretty fun. I think I'd like it. But the ads are far, far too intrusive. Not only are there too many. But, many of them have timers. Some are 30 seconds, and you can't break out. Too annoying. I have no interest I sitting and waiting for ads to finish

Very enjoyable game, quite addictive and jumping back into a new game is quick. Couple of gripes, there seems to be some slow down or framrate dipping after an ad has shown and the option to remove ads isn't working. Sort this out and it will get another 2 stars

Wow!!!! I've never been more annoyed with an app in my life!!! I would play this game all day long but the amount of ads are literally driving me insane! Two runs and another 15 second ad comes up. No thanks

The game was awesome and I loved it. But the latest update ruined it with ADS. They put the banner exactly where you mostly tap with the fingers to change direction, the game got laggy which it was not before and has started getting way too many pop ups. Uninstalling. *Sigh*

A lot of frame rate issues. Lost many runs because controls become unresponsive while gameplay continued. Ads are incredible intrusive. That said, it can be really fun if they cleaned up the coding on this simple game.

I garuntee once you try it, you will absolutely love it! And I'm very sorry if it didn't work out for you. Although I'm sure that won't happen to anybody. Thank you creator, creators, or company who created this game. I recommend this game to everyone that lays eyes on it, and please share this game with your friends and family. Best game EVER! 😘😉
Thanks for the auto reply, idiots! Big coins don't count towards total? Bought a double coin car and the large coins which I believe are supposed to be worth 10 don't add coins at all.

Fun game, annoying ads I was having fun with the game but the ads are intrusive to the point of frustration. I uninstalled it after the fourth noisy video ad popped up in about 5 minutes of play. The only option to remove ads is to buy a car that costs over $20. If there were an option to pay$1 - $5 to remove ads, or if the ads weren't so loud while I have the game on silent, I would have been happy. Fun, simple game, but if I have the game sounds off, the ads should be silent too.

Repetitive and lots of ads. The idea is good. The graphics look nice. But a full 20 second advertisement video after EVERY round.. That got annoying pretty quick! Also there is not much variation.. You just go in circles.. and go.. and go.. and..

description: The most addicting crash race is back with a sequel and tons of improvement!New tracks with easy and hard difficulty options, unique environments and brand new cars!As it's ancestor, Loop Drive 2 is a casual arcade racing game with a gameplay incredibly easy to get started but frustratingly difficult to master.Basically, all you have to do is drive in circles and avoid crashing your car. Adjust your speed as you accelerate and brake at the right moments to avoid crashing into another vehicle.Earn more coins with every loop, unlock cars, expand your collection and see what suits you best.Survive as long as possible, as you train your reactions, climb leaderboard with higher scores and challenge your friends.Hurry up and join the impossible race now!
descriptionHTML:
The most addicting crash race is back with a sequel and tons of improvement!
New tracks with easy and hard difficulty options, unique environments and brand new cars!

As it's ancestor, Loop Drive 2 is a casual arcade racing game with a gameplay incredibly easy to get started but frustratingly difficult to master.
Basically, all you have to do is drive in circles and avoid crashing your car.
Adjust your speed as you accelerate and brake at the right moments to avoid crashing into another vehicle.
Earn more coins with every loop, unlock cars, expand your collection and see what suits you best.
Survive as long as possible, as you train your reactions, climb leaderboard with higher scores and challenge your friends.
Hurry up and join the impossible race now!
developerAddress: RAK FREE TRADE ZONE BLDG PO 10055
summary: Race in circles at full speed, keep your eyes on other cars and do not crash!
title: Loop Drive 2

description: Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. If the player's snake's head collides into a part of another snake, the player loses the game and must start over. The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.The player can activate "boost mode", which causes the avatar to speed up.In the game you will see many popular old memes and also new memes such as "Do u know De Wae"(from VRChat), "Ugandan Knuckles" and many others.Good luck and have a fun!
descriptionHTML:
Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. If the player's snake's head collides into a part of another snake, the player loses the game and must start over. The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.
The player can activate "boost mode", which causes the avatar to speed up.

In the game you will see many popular old memes and also new memes such as "Do u know De Wae"(from VRChat), "Ugandan Knuckles" and many others.


Good luck and have a fun!
recentChanges: Added new meme Uganda Knuckles - Do u know Da Wae, from VRChat
Decrease volume of some sound effects
summary: Move snake around dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow
title: Snake.is MLG Edition

Super fun needs minor improvements Actually very fun but could use a speedometer calibration, the cars go from 215 mph and shoot way down to 170 in the corners of the first track, the speed seems too fast for what the cars are actually doing.. It seems a little stretched but that's all. and sound improvements for the cars ... Other than that it's legit

Graphics are decent. Controls are good. However,  you can earn 10x more $ for a 5 lap race than a 400 lap race. Many times you will be in 1st or 2nd and as the last lap winds down you lose several positions even though nobody passes you.  Oh and the "coming soon" section, don't expect to ever see anything else show up there. Overall, it's a fun game to pass the time,  but these bugs have been reported for at least 2 years and never been fixed.

Needs lots of improvement......... 1. Improve graphics quality like extreme car racing . It will improve the game.  2. Increase the number of opponents in the race.  3. Seriously I don't believe that you added 400 laps race , I think it will be better to race rookies cup which give you 1000 dollar games in just 5 lap.     And you are providing 3000 game dollar for 400 laps . I think you should decrease the 400 laps to 100 or 60 laps it will be a better choice. 4. You have added pit lane in the game so provide a pit stop in the game also .

Great Game but can they add something! Add in cautions, working pit Stalls with tire ware and fuel usage, and tire air pressure adjustment settings so we do get as loose as we do. If you do I will make a YouTube Series about the game and keep this good review!

descriptionHTML:
Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!

Experience the adrenaline as you power over 600 horses around the track. Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways including the 1 Mile, 2.5mi Quad-Oval, a 1.5mi Tri-Oval and the Paperclip!

RACE MODES :
Multiplayer - Race head to head against other players
Regulation - Race and set the difficulty for higher prizes
Ladder - Race against progressively faster opponents for increasing prizes.
Endurance - Race the full 400 lap distance.
Hot Lap - Set your fastest single lap on Game Center
Practice - Practice racing lines and setup car for race trim

CARS:
Includes cars from the golden-era right up to the modern-era. Drive Super Trucks or 1970s classics. Sprint cars and dirt track racing coming soon!

EXPERIENCE THE SPEED
Feel your machine on the absolute limit of adhesion. Earn in-game cash to buy, upgrade, repair and adjust your Stock Car. Qualify to unlock new tracks for increasing prize money.

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER RACING
Beat your friends and join the privileged few to make it onto the leaderboards.

MULTIPLE TRACKS
4 unique tracks to unlock.

REAL CRASH PHYSICS
Persistent car-damage with sparks, smoke and flames for realistic racing.

CUSTOMISE YOUR STOCKCAR
Design your Stock Car with team colours and racing numbers in the Paintshop.

UPGRADE YOUR STOCKCAR
Engine, tires and chassis increasing your car's overall performance.

SETUP YOUR STOCK CAR
Allows you to adjust your car for race trim.

REAL SIMULATION
Visually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics.

RUBBER-BANDING ASSIST
Helps gets you back into the race quicker.

EARN IN-GAME CASH
Based on finishing position and calculated each lap round, the higher you place the more you earn.

Drivers start your engines!

description: Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.The game offers 5 modes :Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)Bonus mode.Game Features:- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.- Free game: play the game for free!- Choose your super heroe. - You can unlock four mine characters.- Incredibly easy operation.Go to adventure!
descriptionHTML:
Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.
Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.


The game offers 5 modes :
Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.
Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.
Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.
Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)
Bonus mode.

Game Features:
- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.
- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.
- Free game: play the game for free!
- Choose your super heroe.
- You can unlock four mine characters.
- Incredibly easy operation.


Go to adventure!
summary: The main goal - to move forward no matter what. Survive at all costs.
title: Quad Squad

comments: Video adds for mobile and long answer times reslly take the fun out of it. As a f2p player you can duel up to 8 other players. If you are unlucky like me this means you cant play if they take hours to answer 3 questions! (Timewindow to answer: 48 hours) :(

Latest update: The agressive pop up ads are gone and have been replaced by video ads. Even when connected to mobile data services. I wouldn't say this is an improvement. Draining my data volume for advertisement is not nice. It's just greedy. This app is producing so much money anyways, why video ads? Wouldn't normal images be enough?  Update: The agressive advertisement is back and it's worse than ever. There are huge amounts of unauthorised browser popups partly midgame and even when the app is simply running in the background. This needs to be addressed!  Earlier: I like this app a lot. The concept behind it is great and it's great fun to play. The questions are mostly balanced aside from the annoyingly football heavy sports category. Lately though the app kept opening up dubious websitest, usually at the beginning of a round. This is absolutely untolerable (!). It should not have the permission to do this. I've been hoping for the latest fee updates to fix this - they didn't.

description: Mit dem öamtc zum "Fahrrad-Champion"Zeige dein Wissen um die Regeln im Straßenverkehr und küre dich zum "Fahrrad-Champion"! Mit dieser App wirst du im Handumdrehen zum Verkehrsregel-Profi. In drei verschiedenen Spielmodi kannst du dich der Herausforderung stellen und vom "Dreirad-Fahrer" zum "Fahrrad-Champion" aufsteigen.Um vom „Dreirad-Fahrer“ zum „Fahrrad-Champion“ aufzusteigen musst du insgesamt 9 Levels bezwingen und mit deinem Wissen 4 Erfahrungsstufen absolvieren:Es werden Fragen zu den Themen Verkehrszeichen, Verhalten im Straßenverkehr sowie Verhalten und Vorrangregeln auf Kreuzungen gestellt. Bei machen Fragen kannst du einfach mit „Ja“ oder „Nein“ antworten. Es erwarten dich aber auch Fragen, bei denen du aus mehreren Antwortmöglichkeiten wählen musst, wobei bei einer Frage auch mehrere Antworten richtig sein können. In diesem Fall ist die Frage nur dann korrekt beantwortet, wenn alle richtigen Antwortmöglichkeiten markiert wurden.Die Spielmodi:Spielmodus „Standard“ - pro Spiel werden dir 10 Fragen gestellt. Es gibt kein Zeitlimit zur Beantwortung.Spielmodus „Auf Zeit“ -  pro Spiel werden dir 10 Fragen gestellt. Pro Frage hast du 15 Sekunden Zeit um die richtige Antwort zu geben.Spielmodus „Master Challenge“ - Du willst die ultimative Herausforderung? Dann ist dieser Modus das Richtige für dich. Alle Fragen des aktuellen Fragenkataloges werden auf einmal gestellt. Die Reihenfolge der Fragen ist zufällig. Du kannst diesen Modus mit oder ohne Zeitlimit spielen, je nachdem welchen Modus du zuletzt gewählt hattest.In allen Spielmodi kannst du auch getrost eine Pause einlegen. Dein jeweiliger Fortschritt wird in der App gespeichert und du kannst später an der gleichen Stelle fortfahren. Auch bereits beantwortete Fragen von abgebrochenen Spielrunden werden zu deinem Gesamtergebnis addiert.Training macht den Meister!Es ist noch kein Champion vom Himmel gefallen. Auf deinem Weg zum "Fahrrad-Champion" wird es einige Fragen geben, die du falsch beantwortet hast. Diese wandern automatisch in den Trainingsmodus und bleiben dort so lange, bis sie von dir richtig beantwortet wurden. Sobald du im Trainingsmodus eine Frage richtig beantwortet hast, verschwindet die Frage wieder aus diesem Modus. Fragen die im Trainingsmodus beantwortet werden, zählen allerdings nicht als beantwortete Fragen für deinen Gesamtfortschritt!********* Rechtliche Hinweise: Für die technische Verfügbarkeit, inhaltliche Richtigkeit und Zuverlässigkeit der Applikation wird keinerlei Zusicherung oder Garantie abgegeben. Die Applikation kann jederzeit, auch ohne vorherige Benachrichtigung der Benutzer geändert oder eingestellt werden. Der ÖAMTC übernimmt keinerlei Haftung für jegliche Schäden, welcher Art auch immer, die aus der Benutzung der Applikation entstehen.
descriptionHTML:
Mit dem öamtc zum "Fahrrad-Champion"

Zeige dein Wissen um die Regeln im Straßenverkehr und küre dich zum "Fahrrad-Champion"! Mit dieser App wirst du im Handumdrehen zum Verkehrsregel-Profi. In drei verschiedenen Spielmodi kannst du dich der Herausforderung stellen und vom "Dreirad-Fahrer" zum "Fahrrad-Champion" aufsteigen.

Um vom „Dreirad-Fahrer“ zum „Fahrrad-Champion“ aufzusteigen musst du insgesamt 9 Levels bezwingen und mit deinem Wissen 4 Erfahrungsstufen absolvieren:

Es werden Fragen zu den Themen Verkehrszeichen, Verhalten im Straßenverkehr sowie Verhalten und Vorrangregeln auf Kreuzungen gestellt. Bei machen Fragen kannst du einfach mit „Ja“ oder „Nein“ antworten. Es erwarten dich aber auch Fragen, bei denen du aus mehreren Antwortmöglichkeiten wählen musst, wobei bei einer Frage auch mehrere Antworten richtig sein können. In diesem Fall ist die Frage nur dann korrekt beantwortet, wenn alle richtigen Antwortmöglichkeiten markiert wurden.

Die Spielmodi:

Spielmodus „Standard“ - pro Spiel werden dir 10 Fragen gestellt. Es gibt kein Zeitlimit zur Beantwortung.
Spielmodus „Auf Zeit“ - pro Spiel werden dir 10 Fragen gestellt. Pro Frage hast du 15 Sekunden Zeit um die richtige Antwort zu geben.
Spielmodus „Master Challenge“ - Du willst die ultimative Herausforderung? Dann ist dieser Modus das Richtige für dich. Alle Fragen des aktuellen Fragenkataloges werden auf einmal gestellt. Die Reihenfolge der Fragen ist zufällig. Du kannst diesen Modus mit oder ohne Zeitlimit spielen, je nachdem welchen Modus du zuletzt gewählt hattest.

In allen Spielmodi kannst du auch getrost eine Pause einlegen. Dein jeweiliger Fortschritt wird in der App gespeichert und du kannst später an der gleichen Stelle fortfahren. Auch bereits beantwortete Fragen von abgebrochenen Spielrunden werden zu deinem Gesamtergebnis addiert.

Training macht den Meister!
Es ist noch kein Champion vom Himmel gefallen. Auf deinem Weg zum "Fahrrad-Champion" wird es einige Fragen geben, die du falsch beantwortet hast. Diese wandern automatisch in den Trainingsmodus und bleiben dort so lange, bis sie von dir richtig beantwortet wurden. Sobald du im Trainingsmodus eine Frage richtig beantwortet hast, verschwindet die Frage wieder aus diesem Modus. Fragen die im Trainingsmodus beantwortet werden, zählen allerdings nicht als beantwortete Fragen für deinen Gesamtfortschritt!


*********

Rechtliche Hinweise: Für die technische Verfügbarkeit, inhaltliche Richtigkeit und Zuverlässigkeit der Applikation wird keinerlei Zusicherung oder Garantie abgegeben. Die Applikation kann jederzeit, auch ohne vorherige Benachrichtigung der Benutzer geändert oder eingestellt werden. Der ÖAMTC übernimmt keinerlei Haftung für jegliche Schäden, welcher Art auch immer, die aus der Benutzung der Applikation entstehen.
summary: Show your knowledge of the rules of the road and will "Bike Champion"!
title: Fahrrad-Champion

comments: This is an amazing game, but it has pros and some cons. PROS: This game has too many pros to list (two of the pros are that it's very realistic, and there's a sandbox). CONS: Engine noise that is different for each vehicle would be nice, but at least not every vehicle has the same sound. Sometimes certain "crews" (AKA Skins) don't apply to certain vehicles. It says you fell of the world when you fall off of the world.

Great game and the best part is it's free!! The only thing I can see that could use some improvement are the controls... and it wouldn't hurt to be able to change the point of view... other than that I say "jolly good show" as I tip my hat to the creators!

Way too many ads. Not just ads, it's that annoying video-kind of ad you have to watch X seconds before you can skip. After every single level. Even in the tutorial, where you need about 30 secs - 1 minute per level.

The ads never stop! videos you can't skip, two ads in between every level, you can't even exit the app with two more ads popping up and having to wait for them to close. Developer should've taken less money to make the gameplay better.

Fun for 3 minutes, then i saw the same ad ten times in a row. OMG. I get it, you have to make money, but this is ridiculous. The forced ads are unbearable. If i wanted to install Terminator wars, Clash of Clans or Bubble Witch Saga, i would have done it already.

Loved the start and finish. Got away from me a little with the desert levels... and the random water levels at the end of the city map. Would've loved more loading and unloading of trucks and as well as the construction arc you sometimes saw with buildings going up.

descriptionHTML:
EPIC STRATEGY. HEROIC PROPORTIONS.

Meet your enemies on the battlefield, and put your tactics to the test. Recruit, train and build your army to battle and conquer every opponent in this turn-based strategy game.

Collect and recruit dozens of units to turn your regiments from a handful of militia into a steeled fighting force. Equip and customize each unit, develop weapons and armor, and master game-changing abilities.

Compete in intense PVP battles against the Warlords of Aternum community and climb to the top of the leaderboards. Do you have what it takes to become a true Warlord?

JOIN THE FIGHT
Take on the orc horde, roaming bandits and fellow warlords in intense turn-based PvE or PvP battles

YOUR MOVE, YOUR VICTORY
Make the right tactical decisions to dominate intense 3D animated combat on the hexagonal battlefield

UNITE THE LAND
Build your army from the ground up and forge powerful alliances

EQUIP YOUR TROOPS
Discover legendary weapons, and unlock tide-turning special abilities

DEFEND YOUR HOME
March through dozens of shires and explore the fantasy land of Dunmar

DESTROY YOUR ENEMIES
Hoist your banner at the top of the PVP leaderboards


Warlords of Aternum is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Warlords of Aternum requires internet access to play and access its social features. Warlords of Aternum may also contain advertising.

Are you ready to join the fight?
recentChanges: A new ranking system will now reward PvP victories with War Coins. These can be traded in for regiment shards at War Harbor.
You will now get a push notification when your units are back from an expedition.
- Some players were not able to sync their accounts via Google Play or Game Center. This has been resolved.
- A rare case in which a spawned unit, such as a Tree of Corruption, would break the battle when taking damage has been fixed.
summary: Put your tactics to the test in an epic fantasy universe
title: Warlords of Aternum

descriptionHTML:

description: Enjoy one of the best free First Person Shooters that will challenge your skills and help you to become a master of the block survival world.If you are young and fragile, expecting a fairytale, this is not a game for you… We need heroes, warriors that master their skills through difficulties, always ready for the ultimate battle!**** TRUTH IS CHALLENGED****Enter a corrupt world where an evil government is working with the so-called New Intelligence, who have made an illegal alliance. Play as the hero in an explosive solo campaign where officials are covering up the truth about the dangers of guns, and the freedom of thought and religion have been all but been banned. **** YOUR MISSION ****The world is immersed in war and the fight for victory has begun, but to conquer, you must navigate the dangers of the armed enemies, who carry high-grade military weaponry and shoot to kill without a thought. It is up to you to protect the innocent and destroy those who have brainwashed the foot soldiers to obey commands without question!**** INTENSE BATTLES ****Battle your way through the edge of survival in a challenging life and death struggle as you navigate enemy territory and face aggressive mobs. Uncover hidden weapons to add to your arsenal as you move through stunning retro-styled pixel-art levels! The dramatic intensity of this undertaking is an adventure like no other, as you struggle in the fight to save the population before they are annihilated by the snipers and assault rifles of the enemy. See and feel the action while you bring down this conspiracy from the inside. You are the last guardian, unaffected by the new world’s lies. It is up to you to be the hero your people need. Don’t trust no one, you don’t have friends here, don’t get fooled by anyone.**** AN AMAZING EXPERIENCE, FROM START TO FINISH ****Hear the roar of your gun as you see another enemy defeated, always moving towards your goal! With the world at stake, Diverse Block Survival Game is difficult to put down! Battle through stunning levels while choosing from among twelve weapons collected as you play!What are you waiting for? Save the world, one block at a time!
descriptionHTML:
Enjoy one of the best free First Person Shooters that will challenge your skills and help you to become a master of the block survival world.

If you are young and fragile, expecting a fairytale, this is not a game for you… We need heroes, warriors that master their skills through difficulties, always ready for the ultimate battle!

**** TRUTH IS CHALLENGED****
Enter a corrupt world where an evil government is working with the so-called New Intelligence, who have made an illegal alliance. Play as the hero in an explosive solo campaign where officials are covering up the truth about the dangers of guns, and the freedom of thought and religion have been all but been banned.

**** YOUR MISSION ****
The world is immersed in war and the fight for victory has begun, but to conquer, you must navigate the dangers of the armed enemies, who carry high-grade military weaponry and shoot to kill without a thought.

It is up to you to protect the innocent and destroy those who have brainwashed the foot soldiers to obey commands without question!

**** INTENSE BATTLES ****
Battle your way through the edge of survival in a challenging life and death struggle as you navigate enemy territory and face aggressive mobs. Uncover hidden weapons to add to your arsenal as you move through stunning retro-styled pixel-art levels!

The dramatic intensity of this undertaking is an adventure like no other, as you struggle in the fight to save the population before they are annihilated by the snipers and assault rifles of the enemy.

See and feel the action while you bring down this conspiracy from the inside. You are the last guardian, unaffected by the new world’s lies.

It is up to you to be the hero your people need. Don’t trust no one, you don’t have friends here, don’t get fooled by anyone.

**** AN AMAZING EXPERIENCE, FROM START TO FINISH ****
Hear the roar of your gun as you see another enemy defeated, always moving towards your goal!
With the world at stake, Diverse Block Survival Game is difficult to put down! Battle through stunning levels while choosing from among twelve weapons collected as you play!

What are you waiting for? Save the world, one block at a time!
summary: Enjoy one of the best free First Person Shooters
title: Diverse Block Survival Game

comments: Amazing addictive game. Try it out! Not too many ads, and just the right amount of challenge without pulling your hair out. Sometimes there's a hidden dot in the title, or ones that are almost the same color as the background, but it's not bad enough to lose a star.

Updated with no fix...  problem still persists.  No exit button and controls for the back button are very wonky. Need to add dedicated exit button or fix what happens when you tap / swipe the blank park of the screen. Trying to bring the controls up from their hidden state selects options is frustrating. You end up starting games. Very unpolished controls, imo.

Cool game, only bad thing is that tutorial levels are rated as bronze so you can never have all gold.. I tried doing the same tutorial three times in a row, then it is counted as gold, but when you exit the game and enter again that it is bronze again

Interesting puzzle type game.  Using rope is a bit challenging on small screens.  It used way too much background data which is not have related at all.  My phone gets hot when using the app.  Uninstalling
Different and fun. Not too hard but still challenging.  Daily challenges are impossible to complete though (bug?) , so don't bother with them (hence my only giving 3 stars)

This right here is a work of genius.  My only wish is for an undo button, for when you accidentally touch a part of the screen and it places a spot/cut/bridge in an unwinnable spot.  Especially annoying during daily challenge that you can't re-do.  Also, I would like to be able to retry any level, such as the daily or randoms, even if it wouldn't "count". I'm convinced every so often there is an unwinable level, but you can't even test it or let the devs know because once you fail it goes away permanently.  Still, a great, great game... I really hope there is a V2 some day.
description: Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle is a new Zen puzzle published by the creators of Puzzlerama and Mazes & More. Challenge your brain, draw, cut and erase to find the solution to the 250+ smart levels. Relax, unwind and let the color flow into the labyrinth of lines, in a Zen experience that will let your mind flow free and antistress. Some levels have a perfect symmetry, other are a maze of lines. Can you master all of them? No pencil needed!How to play Lines – Physics Drawing PuzzleDepending on the level, you will need to tap to place a dot over a line, erase and opponent´s dot, cut or draw lines. Then watch the colors unfold and flow!Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle key features include:- 5 different modes: Point, Erase, Cut, Draw and Mix- Daily Challenges- 26 achievements to unlock-250 smart levels- Use your brain and logics to find the solutions- Bronze, Silver and Gold medals for each level.- Infinite fun!Point ModeTap over a line to place a dot. Be smart and choose and strategic and logic position for the dots. Sometimes you need to place one, other two dots.Eraser ModeTap over an opponent´s dot to erase it. Draw ModeDraw a line with your fingers to connect lines to your advantage. Use your brain!Cut Mode Cut a line to stop the flow of your opponent´s color. Hope you all guys enjoy Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle! Created by our Dutch friends from Gamious!
descriptionHTML:
Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle is a new Zen puzzle published by the creators of Puzzlerama and Mazes & More. Challenge your brain, draw, cut and erase to find the solution to the 250+ smart levels. Relax, unwind and let the color flow into the labyrinth of lines, in a Zen experience that will let your mind flow free and antistress. Some levels have a perfect symmetry, other are a maze of lines. Can you master all of them? No pencil needed!
How to play Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle
Depending on the level, you will need to tap to place a dot over a line, erase and opponent´s dot, cut or draw lines. Then watch the colors unfold and flow!

Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle key features include:
- 5 different modes: Point, Erase, Cut, Draw and Mix
- Daily Challenges
- 26 achievements to unlock
-250 smart levels
- Use your brain and logics to find the solutions
- Bronze, Silver and Gold medals for each level.
- Infinite fun!

Point Mode
Tap over a line to place a dot. Be smart and choose and strategic and logic position for the dots. Sometimes you need to place one, other two dots.

Eraser Mode
Tap over an opponent´s dot to erase it.

Draw Mode
Draw a line with your fingers to connect lines to your advantage. Use your brain!

Cut Mode
Cut a line to stop the flow of your opponent´s color.

Hope you all guys enjoy Lines – Physics Drawing Puzzle! Created by our Dutch friends from Gamious!

Welcome to Planet Gold Rush!

Grab your gear, Young Buck, there's gold in them hills just waitin' for you! Strike it rich in this fun-filled gold mining game where you can explore and survey gold-rich lands, pull the gold from the earth, wash it, and make GOLD BARS! Under our Terms of Services and Privacy Policy, Planet Gold Rush is allowed for download and play only for persons 13 years or over of age without parental consent.

descriptionHTML:
-Over 3,000,000 Downloads!-
Thanks to your support, we now share the happiness and joy of toy games with millions of players all over the world!

-Description-
Time can change many things, but not everything. Take a time travel to your dearest childhood, continue your unfinished adventure and join this toy game!
Lead your green army soldiers, remote-control planes, rubber ducks, transformers and many other toys to defend your bedroom, hallway, living room and backyard against the invasion of the Evil Legion! To experience a great war game!

-Features-
Lilliputian Toy War:
• Build Headquarters in your bedroom, use the moneybox as your treasury, transport resources with your little train, and collect metal with magnets. Every houseware has its unique function in this toy world!
• Fight the enemies in the kitchen, the living room and even the bathroom! The adventurous and playful battlefields will make war interesting and fun!

Grow Your Army:
• Design and assemble ultimate strategic bomber to strike out your enemies!
• Recruit the elite toys as heroes to lead your army, let the toy war commence!
• Upgrade and promote your green army soldiers, flamethrowers, snipers, tanks, artillery units and many more troops of various types to teach your enemy a lesson!

Expand and Exterminate:
• Compete with real players for more territory, greater power and higher prestige.
• Build fortifications to keep invaders at bay.

Strategize to Win:
• It takes patience and strategic moves. Build and deploy your troops with heroes wisely. With a good strategy, you can defeat enemy troops much bigger than yours in size!
• Outwit your enemy with intelligence and timing rather than brutal force.

Play with Global Players:
• Get to know friends with the same interest and ambition as yours in the alliance.
• Compete or cooperate with other alliances. Diplomacy or War, it’s up to you!
• Chat with players from all over the world without barrier anytime and anywhere.

-We Are Waiting For You!-
Childhood is unforgettable, and the toy soldier game is irreplaceable. Join us in the toy world and it will be a better place with your participation!

PLEASE NOTE: Army Men Strike is free to download and play, Some Game items that can also be purchased for real money. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.

Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ArmyMenStrike/

description: Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.Features:▶ DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE TOURIST DESTINATION - mountain roads, hotels, ice skate rinks, ski slopes and slaloms!▶ 15 COOL CARS - snow plows, road gritter truck, buses, 4x4 pickup trucks, a snowmobile bike and more!▶ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!▶ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.

Features:
▶ DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE TOURIST DESTINATION - mountain roads, hotels, ice skate rinks, ski slopes and slaloms!
▶ 15 COOL CARS - snow plows, road gritter truck, buses, 4x4 pickup trucks, a snowmobile bike and more!
▶ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking
▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!
▶ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!

Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.

Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.

Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!

description: Take part in one of the BattleMinibots armoured car shows – spectacular robots fighting games of armoured car and robot warriors radio-guided vehicles. These indestructible battle cars are extremely dangerous, each with its unique weapon for death racing. Create your own armoured car minibot in the garage and upgrade its properties to make it to the try-out and become a member of the mech robot wars League!Enjoy watching steel robot fighting BattleBots and armoured car Robot Wars shows? Always dreamed of creating your own indestructible battle cars robot and building a team to take part in the death racing show? With Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots robots fighting games ANYONE can be part of robot warriors and armoured car wars game – this car battle is thrilling, and it's free!Drive to the steel robot fighting arena and be ready for the most breathtaking car wars game with death racing! These robots vs robots car battles are something really amazing!Face the most powerful death racing super mechs. You're going to deal with them in mech robot wars:ExcabotDrillbotSmile minibombSawbotNailthrower, and other machines for car battle!Complete super mechs tasks and earn great rewards. Get improving weapons (flame-thrower, magnets, taser, saws etc), armour to protect minibot’s body. Find the best equipment for the minibot and create your own destruction machine. There are new minibots for your collection!Fight with your super mechs on multiple battle arena locations with additional obstacles – traps, spike strips, kill saws, hell raisers, ramrods, etc. Interact with objects on the battle arena (crates, fire extinguishers) and learn how to use the traps in your favour. descriptionHTML:
Take part in one of the BattleMinibots armoured car shows – spectacular robots fighting games of armoured car and robot warriors radio-guided vehicles. These indestructible battle cars are extremely dangerous, each with its unique weapon for death racing. Create your own armoured car minibot in the garage and upgrade its properties to make it to the try-out and become a member of the mech robot wars League!

Enjoy watching steel robot fighting BattleBots and armoured car Robot Wars shows? Always dreamed of creating your own indestructible battle cars robot and building a team to take part in the death racing show? With Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots robots fighting games ANYONE can be part of robot warriors and armoured car wars game – this car battle is thrilling, and it's free!

Drive to the steel robot fighting arena and be ready for the most breathtaking car wars game with death racing! These robots vs robots car battles are something really amazing!

Face the most powerful death racing super mechs. You're going to deal with them in mech robot wars:
Excabot
Drillbot
Smile minibomb
Sawbot
Nailthrower, and other machines for car battle!

Complete super mechs tasks and earn great rewards. Get improving weapons (flame-thrower, magnets, taser, saws etc), armour to protect minibot’s body. Find the best equipment for the minibot and create your own destruction machine. There are new minibots for your collection!

Fight with your super mechs on multiple battle arena locations with additional obstacles – traps, spike strips, kill saws, hell raisers, ramrods, etc. Interact with objects on the battle arena (crates, fire extinguishers) and learn how to use the traps in your favour. Earn experience points in robots fighting games and get access to minibot customization – new armour, weapons and styles for more breathtaking car wars game.

And remember: the more achievements you unlock, the better, as only the most persistent players will join the mech robot wars League. Let the car wars game start!

Mighty iron warriors and thrilling robots vs robots PvP battle arena fights.

description: Skyblock Islands is the unique multiplayer hit you don’t want to miss! Combining strategy, RPG and FPS into an action packed arena shooter where you must choose your cards wisely and shoot first! Annihilate your opponents in one-on-one brawls where good strategy and quick reflexes are key to survival! comments: So lovely! Good game. You can easily make money and food, breeding and nurturing are pretty fast, unlike other games where you'd have to wait 24 hours or more for things to be done. Interactions with dogs are amazing, thet do so many tricks! I do have some issues with notifications (as in , I never get any ) and the packs; the game freezes completely when I take free or daily packs and sometimes when I restart the game I don't get the bonus from the packs at all.. And I was never able to watch videos for free packs.That is sad, but other than that this game really deserves 5 stars.

I got this game a couple of weeks ago and with the newest update, I can't do anything. Any time I try to click on a dog, the oven to get food, or anywhere, nothing happens. It's frustrating and I don't want to get rid of this game. Fix this problem please, I am too far in this game to restart.
Really like the game but the spin wheel is a joke. Total waste of gems getting the same result each time you try again. Impossible to get more than a 2 star dog. Getting annoyed! Seems rigged to me!
Its an awesome game. Way better than i expected. So easy to earn things and breed etc. The only problem i got right now is that it wont load for some reason. But will keep trying

The game itself is fun and i like it, but its way to hard to get tokens to buy dog cards. Especially when one dog card can cost 1,000 or more tokens. Right now I'm stuck in the main quests because i can't level my dogs up enough because I can't get enough tokens without paying real money.

Wish there is a way yo can buy certain dogs with cash bc you can never land on the certain dogs, it get almost there then it does back. Wondering if you already have one of a certain breed can we plz buy the other colors to thwt breed so you can really collect other then always getting the same dog and color everytime, or atleast when you have a certain dogs renové that one from the spin so you want get everytime!!!  Plz help
description: Dog Town is a FREE pet caring simulation game where you can collect dog cards and dogs like: basset hound, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Bull Terrier, Great Dane, Shnauzer, Cocker Spaniel, French Bulldog, Pomeranian, Doberman, Siberian Husky, Miniature Pinscher, Labrador, Beagle, Chihuahua, Corgi, Dachshund and other dog breeds with a large emphasis on Dog Collection and management for casual and midcore players. Players will collect dogs, train them to level them up and send them to quests for exciting in-game rewards! If you always wanted to adopt a pet, play with puppies was interested in pet rescue this is one of the best pet games for you. With the ability to customize the rooms where their dogs will live we've put tremendous amount of effort to ensure that players would feel attached to their dogs just like they would to the real ones.In coming updates we will bring more dog cards for cute puppies and dogs to groom and breed like Dachshund, Corgi , Chihuahua, Labrador, Beagle, Miniature Pinscher, Siberian Husky, Doberman, Pomeranian, French Bulldog, Cocker Spaniel, Shnauzer, Great Dane, Bull Terrier, Yorkshire Terrier, Australian Shepherd, Labrador Retriever, Boston Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, basset hound and many others puppies! Each dog will have a unique character and behavior, so players will always recognize their "Sleepy" from the "Jumpy"! And what's better is that the game is in full 3D and a planned VR support coming in future updates will ensure that the immersion to the Dog Town is always at high levels!Start collecting your dogs now and show your own collection to the world!FEATURES★ Gorgeous 3D environment! ★ Realistic Dogs with lifelike behavior! ★ Breed and groom your own Dog Collection!★ Level up your dogs and send them to quests!★ Decorate your rooms with hundreds of decorations!★ More than 60 dogs to collect and more to come!PLEASE NOTE!This game is still in early development.And a network connection is required.UPCOMING FEATURES● Interaction with the dogs● Translation (German, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese and few more)● More dogs and decorations● Backyard / Minigames ● Dog dressup and competition with friendsUpcoming dog breeds: basset hound, Dachshund, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Chihuahua, Corgi, Labrador, Beagle, Springer Spaniel, Miniature Pinscher, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Siberian Husky, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Doberman,  Bull Terrier, Pomeranian,  Great Dane, Shnauzer, French Bulldog,  Cocker Spaniel and other dogs.Best dog simulation and pet rescue game ever!If you are having any problems in the game or have a great idea about it please contact gamesupport@frismos.com

description:
The devious pranksters are back at it again with an all new trolling nightmare: Troll Face Quest Video Games 2! Spoof iconic video games and prank the pants off all those characters. Get lost in a crazy world of video game shenanigans and try to escape the pranking trolls!
PHONE-SMASHING FEATURES
• 85+ million installs across the legendary Troll Face Quest franchise!• Troll famous video games!• 35+ hilarious levels of pranking insanity!• Unlock insane achievements!• Lots of wacky collectibles!• No Wi-fi needed!• A funny trip through a loony video game world!
THE RETURN OF TROLL RAIDER
Get ready for a trolling adventure that’ll take you back to your intense video game playing days. Troll  adventurous, monkey-swinging babes in tight shorts, steal the wheels from an Italian plumber’s go-kart , prank entire cities under the rule of theft, murder, and mayhem, and piss off birds for no good reason. Will you solve the crazy pranks and win a chicken dinner or will you end up in the loony bin? It’s payback time for all those levels you didn’t complete.
TROLLING TIME NEVER RUNS OUT
A whirlwind of trolls and pranks, this is another baffling game that will make you throw your cell phones against the wall. Keep your eye on the ball and crush the prankster video game characters before they troll you into the dirt!
Do you have the guts to prank your childhood video game stars into oblivion?

description: Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle is very classic, unique, challenging and addictive game. It’s time to install and play famous rock paper scissor classic game in your device. So let’s play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.Game is simple and easy to play. Moreover, to make game interesting there are two modes in the game. You can play with artificial intelligence or you can play with your family or friends, game represent a real challenge. In this legendary rock paper scissor game you and the opponent choose a sign of your choice. If you’re a beginner and don’t know the rule of the game, don’t worry here’s a short detail of the rules of the game. First You and your opponent (friend or family) choose a sign of rock, paper and scissor that you will then compare, the rock break the scissors but covered by the paper, the paper beat the stone but cut by the scissors and the scissors beat the paper but are broken by the stone. So make wise ways and challenge the opponent.Features•	Amazing Hd graphics to make the game more interesting and colorful.•	Play the game Vs. A.I and also against your family and friends.•	Challenging background sound.•	The person with max points will win the game.•	Simple and interesting user interface.•	Invite your family and friends and compete with them.•	Very small size of the app force you to keep it in your device.So download Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle and start having fun by playing in leisure time.Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle By BACA BACA Games in casual and family category 2017.

description: If you’re into makeover games, this one will knock your socks off. And if you’re not into makeover games, this one will change that! You’re the hottest new fashion stylist girl in Hollywood, and your awesome reputation is already bringing you fame and fortune! Dress up famous fashion models and VIP celebrities. Bring out their star style and give them beautiful makeovers! Create tons of incredible looks for your clients - find them the perfect outfits for their big events - they’ll love their new hot tops, skirts, shoes and accessories!Welcome to Hollywood - the land of VIPs, where fashion rules and all the celebrities and famous models need to look amazing to keep up their star status! That’s where you come in - you're the stylist to the stars! Everyone’s talking about the hot looks you created at the latest red carpet event (that skirt Angie J. wore - AMAZING!), and now all the girls are piling in to your stylist office for fashion makeovers! Dress up these girls and make them over, in this most fabulous of all makeover games!Features:> You’re the next big thing - stylist girl to the stars! Open up your very own Hollywood stylist office and become famous! Makeover games are the perfect way to perfect your star style.> Style and dress up your VIP clients (supermodels, famous movie stars and more!) in glamorous outfits - once you choose the perfect top and skirt, add gorgeous accessories to finish off the look!> From magazine cover shoots to red carpet movie premieres, it’s your job to give your clients makeovers that will help them wow the crowds!> Dress up your models in fabulous clothes (dresses, skirts, shoes, pants and more) at the trendiest stores - Chick Shack, Party Fever and Stardust, and add perfect accessories to complete their outfits!> Help your clients get the prettiest makeovers the world has ever seen!> No makeover is complete without a mani! Make sure their nails are perfect - add cool stickers and nail jewels, and complement their manicures with rings and bracelets! > To make it in show business, stunning hair is key! Get your celebrity models killer new hairstyles!> Reach #1 in the Top Stylist charts, gain followers and likes!> Help your models win lots of fashion catwalk and photoshoot contests! The judges will adore the skirts and shoes you dressed them in!> Play fun fashion girl and stylist minigames! > Collect coins as you style and dress up. Makeover games are so much fun!ABOUT Coco PlayCoco Play Limited is China-based developer of creative and unique apps for kids. Founded in 2013, Coco Play provides rich 3D simulation-based games for the whole family.
